prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: A-Dragon Shouts
mes:
Shouts

Animal Allegiance	A Shout for help from the beasts of the wild, who come to fight in your defense.
RAaN  Raan	Animal	50	Angarvunde
MIr Mir	Allegiance	60
TAh Tah	Pack	70

Aura Whisper	Your Voice is not a Shout, but a whisper, revealing the life forces of any and all.
LAaS Laas	Life	30	Northwind Summit
YAh Yah	Seek	40
NIr Nir	Hunt	50


Battle Fury  Your Thu'um enchants your nearby allies' weapons, allowing them to attack faster.
MID Mid	Loyal	20	Vahlok's Tomb
VUr Vur	Valor	30
SHAaN Shaan	Inspire	40

Become Ethereal	The Thu'um reaches out to the Void, changing your form to one that cannot harm, or be harmed.
FEiM Feim	Fade	30
ZIi Zii	Spirit	40
GRON Gron	Bind	50


Bend Will  Your voice bends the very stones to your will. As it gains power, animals, people, and even dragons must do your bidding.
GOL Gol	Earth	10	Saering's Watch
HAh Hah	Mind	90	Apocrypha – learned from Hermaeus Mora
DOV Dov	Dragon	120	Skaal Village – learned from Hermaeus Mora


Clear Skies	Skyrim itself yields before the Thu'um, as you clear away fog and inclement weather.
LOK Lok	Sky	5
VAh Vah	Spring	10
KOoR Koor	Summer	15

Cyclone Your Thu'um creates a whirling cyclone that sows chaos among your enemies.
VEN Ven	    Wind	30
GAaR Gaar	Unleash	45
NOS Nos	Strike	60

Disarm	Shout defies steel, as you rip the weapon from an opponent's grasp.
ZUN Zun	Weapon	30
HAaL Haal	Hand	35
VIiK Viik	Defeat	40


Dismay	And the weak shall fear the Thu'um, and flee in Terror.
FAaS Faas	Fear	40
RU Ru	Run	45
MAaR Maar	Terror	50


Dragon Aspect Once a day, take on the mighty aspect of a dragon, delivering colossal blows, with an armored hide, and more powerful shouts.
MUL Mul	Strength	5	
QAh Qah	Armor	5
DIiV Diiv	Wyrm	5


Dragonrend	Your Voice lashes out at a dragon's very soul, forcing the beast to land.
JOoR Joor	Mortal	10	Throat of the World – during "Alduin's Bane"
ZAh Zah	Finite	12
FRUL Frul	Temporary	15


Drain Vitality Coax both magical and mortal energies from your hapless opponent.
GAaN Gaan	Stamina	30	Arcwind Point
LAh Lah	Magicka	60
HAaS Haas	Health	90


Elemental Fury	The Thu'um imbues your arms with the speed of wind, allowing for faster weapon strikes.
SU Su	Air	30
GRAh Grah	Battle	40
DUN Dun	Grace	50


Fire Breath	Inhale air, exhale flame, and behold the Thu'um as inferno.
YOL Yol	Fire	30	Dustman's Cairn – during "Proving Honor"
TOoR Toor	Inferno	50
SHUL Shul	Sun	100


Frost Breath	Your breath is winter, your Thu'um a blizzard.
FO Fo	Frost	30	Bonestrewn Crest
KRAh Krah	Cold	50
DIiN Diin	Freeze	100


Ice Form	Your Thu'um freezes an opponent solid.
IiZ Iiz	Ice	60	Frostmere Crypt
SLEN Slen	Flesh	90
NUS Nus	Statue	120


Kyne's Peace	The Voice soothes wild beasts, who lose their desire to fight or flee.
KAaN Kaan	Kyne	40	Ragnvald
DREM Drem	Peace	50
OV Ov	Trust	60


Marked for Death	Speak, and let your Voice herald doom, as an opponent's armor and lifeforce are weakened.
KRIi Krii	Kill	20	
LUN Lun	Leech	30
AUS Aus	Suffer	40


Soul Tear
DG

Your Thu'um cuts through flesh and shatters soul, commanding the will of the fallen.
RIi Rii	Essence	5	Each word learned from Durnehviir after he is summoned
VAaZ Vaaz	Tear	5
ZOL Zol	Zombie	90

Slow Time	Shout at time, and command it to obey, as the world around you stands still.
TIiD Tiid	Time	30
KLO Klo	Sand	45
UL Ul	Eternity	60


Storm Call	A Shout to the skies, a cry to the clouds, that awakens the destructive force of Skyrim's lightning.
STRUN Strun	Storm	300	Forelhost
BAh Bah	Wrath	480
QO Qo	Lightning	600


Whirlwind Sprint	The Thu'um rushes forward, carrying you in its wake with the speed of a tempest.
WULD Wuld	Whirlwind	20	
NAh Nah	Fury	25
KEST Kest	Tempest	35






Summon Durnehviir
DG

Durnehviir! Hear my Voice and come forth from the Soul Cairn. I summon you in my time of need.
DUr Dur	Curse	5	All words learned from Durnehviir in the Soul Cairn.
NEH Neh	Never	5
VIiR Viir	Dying	300
Throw Voice	The Thu'um is heard, but its source unknown, fooling those into seeking it out.
ZUL Zul	Voice	30	
Shearpoint – All words learned at once

MEy Mey	Fool	15
GUT Gut	Far	5
Unrelenting Force	Your Voice is raw power, pushing aside anything - or anyone - who stands in your path.
FUS Fus	Force	15	Bleak Falls Barrow
RO Ro	Balance	20	High Hrothgar – during "The Way of the Voice"
DAh Dah	Push	45	High Hrothgar – during "The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller"
